page.title: 01HORBURY AND DISTRICT
page.content: The area is South West of Wakefield and includes HORBURY,SOUTH OSSETT,HORBURY BRIDGE and LUPSET. The River Calder runs through the valley and this fact greatly influenced the areas early development. The M1 motorway has played a similar role in its more recent development. The area has some industry and farming but is mainly residential serving the larger nearby cities. The area is rich in history and owes its early beginings to the textile industry. There are a number of noteable historic buildings. Leisure activities are well catered for many different forms of clubs exist for both young and old.
